        public java.lang.Integer getDeviceForCurrentThread()

      • getNextDevice

        protected java.lang.Integer getNextDevice(long threadId)
        This method returns device id available. Round-robin balancing used here.
        Parameters:
        threadId - this parameter can be anything, it's used for logging only.
        Returns:
